trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> Zdarzenie jest wywoływane przez projektanta hosta dla pewne akcje w formancie na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> Jest obsługiwany przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegować metody, która przyjmuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiektu jako parametr.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> Klasa zapewnia domyślne pełnomocnika, aby obsłużyć <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Projektanci kontrolki niestandardowej zastępują <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> metody przetwarzania tych zdarzeń formantu na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje host projektanta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiektu dla typu akcji na powierzchni projektu, a następnie przekazuje obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegowanie.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> Właściwość reprezentuje obszar projektanta kontroli zdarzenie dotyczy.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiektu wskazuje typ akcji:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> Właściwości dostarcza argumentów zdarzenia, które są specyficzne dla typu akcji.

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer host initializes <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objects as follows:
trans-unit.target: Na przykład host projektanta inicjuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiekty w następujący sposób:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object when you click a region.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> obiektu po kliknięciu regionu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object when a control is drawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> obiekt narysować kontrolkę na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object when the template editing mode changes for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> obiektu, gdy tryb edycji szablonu dla formantu na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji o zdarzeniach i delegatów, zobacz [NIB: zdarzenia i delegatów](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The type of action that raised the event; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.
trans-unit.target: Typ akcji, który wywołał zdarzenie; używany do inicjowania <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer region that the action applies to; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: Projektanta regionu, którego dotyczy akcji; używany do inicjowania <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments associated with <c>eventType</c>; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Argumenty zdarzeń skojarzonych z <c>eventType</c>; używane do zainicjowania <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> class for the type of view event on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> klasy dla typu widoku zdarzeń na powierzchni projektu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used by the designer host to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> Konstruktor jest używany przez hosta projektanta zainicjować <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: The designer host passes the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Zainicjowana klasa przekazuje host projektanta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> do obiektu <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegowanie.

trans-unit.source: Typically, `region` is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Zazwyczaj `region` ustawiono dla <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> zdarzenia i `null` (`Nothing` w języku Visual Basic) dla <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event arguments that are associated with the action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera argumenty zdarzeń, które są skojarzone z akcją, który wywołał zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> that contains additional event data that is specific to the type of event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> Zawiera dane dodatkowe zdarzenia, które są specyficzne dla typu zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> Właściwości dostarcza argumentów zdarzenia, które są specyficzne dla typu akcji, która została określona w <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you click a region, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event, and then initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład po kliknięciu obszarem projektanta hosta inicjuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> jako <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> zdarzeń i inicjuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> właściwość jako <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event, or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Podobnie, host projektanta inicjuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> właściwości o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> zdarzeń, lub <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> Właściwość jest inicjowana przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> konstruktora.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ akcji, która wywołała zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> that specifies the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> , który określa typ akcji, która wywołała zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action raised the event:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> obiektu wskazuje typ akcji zgłoszone zdarzenie:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> Właściwości dostarcza argumentów zdarzenia, które są specyficzne dla typu akcji.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> Właściwość jest inicjowana przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> konstruktora.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera projektanta obszarze, w którym zdarzenie dotyczy.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> Stosowanym do akcji.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> Właściwość reprezentuje obszar projektanta kontroli zdarzenie dotyczy.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Zazwyczaj <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> właściwość ma wartość dla <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> zdarzenia i `null` (`Nothing` w języku Visual Basic) dla <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> Właściwość jest inicjowana przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> konstruktora.
